section.title: Including own actions
section.para: The generic <action> element references Spring beans that implement the Java interface com.consol.citrus.TestAction. This is a very fast way to add your own action implementations to a test case. You can implement own actions in Java and include them into a test case.
In the example above the called actions are special database cleanup implementations. The actions are defined as Spring beans in the Citrus configuration and get referenced by their bean name or id.
